text: Mild blow to the forehead.
Blow to the temple causes disorientation.
Everything goes black for a few seconds, can see stars, and head throbs.
Skull cracks loudly under the blow. Blow exposes bone.
Skull shatters like a melon. Bits of brain and bone fly everywhere. Dead.
A very minor, but shocking injury.
Blow to the face leaves a black eye and a taste of blood in the mouth.
Blunt eye trauma, and eye socket bruised
Broken nose.
Dislocated jaw, with teeth chipped
Lower jaw broken and teeth gone.
Face mangled. Shattered jaw.
Face mangled. Shattered cheekbone.
Face mangled. Eye damaged.
Face is pulverized. Facial bones and tissue reduced to a bloody mush. Dead.
Bruised jaw.
Solid blow. Will leave a shiner.
Solid blow. Split a lip.
Solid blow. Caused a nosebleed.
Fractured jaw. Several teeth shattered.
Face mangled. Shattered jaw.
Face mangled. Shattered cheekbone.
Face mangled. Eye damaged.
Blow to the jaw breaks the neck. Death is immediate.
A glancing blow. Slight pain
Temporary choking and pain occurs.
Blow causes choking, raspy wheezing accompanies breath.
Windpipe is crushed. It takes everything to breathe.
Vertebrae in the neck are shattered, contorting the head unnaturally.  Instant death.
Impact is felt, but no bruise.
Distracting buzzing sensation.
Shoulder is bruised and swollen. Every movement of the arm sends stinging pain.
Shoulder is dislocated by the blow. Arm hangs uselessly by side.
Shoulder caves in with broken bones. Arm useless.
Thump.
Will leave a bruise.
Bicep is heavily bruised and inflamed, sending sharp pain with every movement.
Fractured humerus, with major swelling. Moving the arm is extremely painful.
Broken humerus. Arm is limp and bleeding profusely.
Slight bump.
Funny bone effect.
Blow strikes a nerve and causes forearm to go numb. Elbow swells up.
Elbow dislocated. Recoverable, but arm refuses to move.
Elbow joint broken into many pieces. Lower arm can bend in opposite direction.
Minor bump. Barely notice it.
Arm knocked aside, some bruising.
Brutal blow knocks arm aside. Sudden movements are painful
Radius fractured with blinding pain.
Open compound fracture with severed blood veseels.
Blow connects to the hand.
Hand knocked aside, some bruising.
Fingers smashed.
Hand or wrist mangled with some fingers disabled.
Hand completely crushed.
Bump.
Solid blow, minor brusing.
Knocks out the wind. Bad brusing. Taking deep breaths is going to be painful for a while.
Mighty upwards blow fractures and dislocates the shoulder. Arm disabled until fixed.
Several broken ribs and internal bleeding. Punctured lung.
Thump.
Solid blow, minor brusing.
Knocks out the wind. Bad brusing. Taking deep breaths is going to be painful for a while.
A few ribs fractured. Every breath sends sharp pain throughout your body.
Sternum explodes, and lungs are punctured. You cough up blood and breathing is ragged.
Bump.
Blow to the gut forces to bend over.
Knocks out the wind. Bad bruising and concussed organs.
Spleen ruptured. Intestines compressed against spinal cord. You will need a good doctor.
Spleen explodes, and diaphragmatic rupture puts intestines inside chest. Internal bleeding everywhere.
Bump.
Solid blow leaves a bruise.
Bad bruising and abdominal pain.
Fractured hipbone. Joint feels like it can give at any moment.
Hipbones shatter, internal organs rupture. Can never walk again.
Minor bump.
Some bruising.
Swelling and some tearing on reproductive organs. Pain causes you to double over.
Surface organs crushed. Nausea hits like a truck.
Pelvic bones shattered, nearest organs reduced to a bloody mess. You will never walk again.
Bump.
Solid blow. Will leave a bruise.
Minor fracture in the femur. Some swelling.
Broken femur with bad swelling.
Open femur fracture with sharp bone ends showing through tissue.
Thump.
Solid blow creates a buzzing sensation in the joint.
Concussed knee and minor ruptures. Some swelling.
Closed knee fracture. Causes limp due to chipped bone and torn tendons.
Knee shattered beyond repair. Leg unstable and can't stand.
Bump.
An eye watering thump.
Minor fracture in the shin. Putting weight on the leg is painful. Some swelling.
Closed shin bone fracture with bad swelling.
Shin bends into an unnatural shape with sharp bone fragments poking out..
Ow.
An eye watering crunch.
Minor foot fractures. Putting weight on the leg is painful.
Some toes smashed.
Foot completely smashed.
Some torn skin, a little blood.
Grazed scalp or temple. Surprising amount of blood.
Long graze along the skull. Serious bleeding.
Skull is pierced. Brain damaged.
The brain is pierced. Body goes limp and collapses. Instant death.
A graze, but nothing serious.
Grazed cheek. Surprising amount of blood.
Scarring slice on cheekbone.
Part of the face pierced, but misses the brain. It's bad. Hideous scar on jaw.
Head pierced through the eye. Body goes limp and collapses. Death is instantaneous.
Grazed jaw.
Grazed cheek. Surprising amount of blood.
Jaw fractured, cheek ripped open.
Jaw completely shattered, many teeth destroyed.
Brainstem pierced. Death is instantaneous.
Just a sting.
Deflected by collarbone. Some blood.
Pierced above the collarbone, missing major blood vessels.
Throat is pierced, damaging the windpipe.
Throat implaed, neck possibly broken. Death is almost instantaneous.
Shoulder grazed.
Skids off the shoulder. Stings pretty bad.
Skids off the bone. Not much blood, but hurts.
Shoulder pierced.
Shoulder pierced. Bad bleeding.
Stings like a famished horse fly.
Bicep laceration.
Deeper flesh wound on the outer arm.
Passes through the arm, chipping the bone.
Goes clean through the arm, tearing the flesh. Major blood vessel cut.
Grazed.
Sting leaves a bad funny bone effect.
Solid blow hits the bone. Fingers are numb for a while.
Pierces elbow area and damages bone. Arm useless until healed.
Elbow broken. Open frature. Arm useless with a lot of blood.
Glancing blow leaves a scratch.
Glancing blow leaves a cut.
Punctures skin and hits bone with pain running through the whole arm
Passes through the arm, missing bone. Lots of blood.
Passes through the arm, spurting blood. Major blood vessel cut.
Stings, but nothing serious.
Minor puncture of hand or fingers.
Deeper puncture for hitting bone.
Hand pierced with lots of blood.
Hand pierced. Lost a finger.
Blow grazes skin and muscle, but is deflected by bone.
Long, shallow wound along the ribs.
Most of the softer tissue under in armpit is messed up.
Pierces deep, but slides along the ribs and misses major organs.
Pierced heart. Death is almost instantaneous
Blow grazes skin and muscle, but is deflected by bone.
Long, shallow wound along the ribs.
Pierces ribcage, but misses major organs.
Punctured lung leads to stabbing pain, shortness of breath and eerie sucking sound with bubbles in the blood.
Pierced heart. Death is almost instantaneous
Lacerates skin without puncturing it.
Pierces skin and surface fat, passing straight through.
Pierces body without puncturing any major organs. Painful and bleeds hard.
Bad puncture with a lot of blood and some internal damage.
Massive organ damage. Death is imminent.
Grazed.
Shallow puncture.
Penetrates muscle on upper hip, but misses major organs.
Deep into the pelvis, clean exit. Stable fracture.
Drives straight through hip and into pelvis. Blood vessels ventilated, and bladder ruptured.
Nothing serious.
Painful stab, but organs still functional.
Surface organs are pierced, but remain attached.
Weapon drives into pelvis and severs reproductive organs.
Point splits pelvis in two and lands in abdomen, tearing apart all organs and causes fatal bloodloss
Just a scratch.
Surface layer piereced. Some blood.
Thigh muscles penetrated almost to the bone.
Thigh completely pierced. Leg can only support for short amounts of time.
Inner thigh pierced, femoral artery cut.
Minor graze.
Bounces off from the bone. Some blood.
Knee is hit. Joint is painful but remains fully functional.
Blow jacks up knee. Causes limp due chipped bone and torn tendons.
Knee fractured, femoral nerve severed. Leg is numb and knee won't lock anymore.
Hurts, but no blood.
Bounces off from the bone. Some blood.
Shallow puncture or surface wound. Chipped bone and minor ligament damage.
Shin completely pierced with bone damage.
Shin completely pierced with tendon injury.
Just a graze.
Minor puncture, but balance is compromised.
Deeper puncture hitting bone. Minor fractures.
Foot pierced with lots of blood.
Foot pierced.
A graze, but nothing serious. Some blood in the hair.
Small cut, hair thick with blood. Itches like hell.
Flap of loose scalp. Dizziness and bleeding.
Deep cut with skull intact. Dizziness and bleeding.
Cracked skull and a lot of blood. Severe concussion.
Cracked skull and a lot of blood. Brain damage.
Cracked skull and a lot of blood. Ear trauma.
The skull cracks open like an egg, blood spurting high in the air. Instant death.
Small cut on cheek, some blood.
Handsome scar on cheek, some blood.
Ugly scar on forehead.
Face mangled. Shattered jaw.
Cerebellum destroyed in a fountain of blood. Instant death.
Small cut on cheek, some blood.
Handsome scar on cheek, some blood.
Cleaves through cheek, slicing oepn tongue.
Mouth completely split open. Lots of blood.
Head almost decapitated above the jaw. Instant death.
Just a scratch
A close shave. Trickle of blood.
Lacerates throat. Eerie sucking noise and difficult to breathe.
Jugular vein cut. Lots of blood.
Total or near-total decapitation in a fountain of blood. Instant death.
Shaves off some skin.
Nasty cut scrapes on the shoulder bones.
Deeper flesh wound on the outer arm.
Blade cuts to the bone. Lots of blood.
Arm severed clean at the shoulder in a spray of blood. Barely a stump remains.
Shaves off some skin.
Long gash by the elbow.
Deeper flesh wound on the outer arm.
Blade bites through the muscle and reached bone on the outer arm.
Arm severed above the elbow in a shower of blood.
Glancing blow.
Small cut, but funny bone effect.
Solid blow hits the bone. Fingers are numb for a while.
Mangled elbow renders arm useless with pain extending to the fingers.
Arm severed at the elbow in a spray of blood.
Light slash along the forearm. Some blood.
Long but shallow gash. Bleeds a lot.
Nasty cut damages ulnar nerve. Fingers are numb.
Arm broken with a lot of blood.
Forearm completely mangled
Grazed hand.
Small cut, but hand flinches from the pain.
Deep, bleeding cut on hand.
Some fingers lost.
Hand completely mangled.
Minor slash. Some torn skin.
Nasty cut scrapes on the ribs, but does little damage.
Deep gash wound into the soft bits.
Cleaves through the flesh and reaches bone.
Arm severed at a shoulder in a spray of blood.
Minor slash. Some torn skin.
Nasty cut scrapes on the ribs, but does little damage.
Deep gash that fractures several ribs.
Cleaves through ribcage. Alive, bug lungs are barely holding together.
Weapon makes it halway to the hips. Cardiovascular system torn in half. Dead.
Just a red slash.
Painful, bleeding cut. Looks worse than it is.
Deeper cut that bleeds hard. No organ damage.
Swing claves through important organs. Speed ruptured and intestines are bleeding internally.
Blade tears through stomach, entrails and blood come pouring out. Death comes after a few fatal seconds.
Glancing blow.
Surface wound. Painful, but nothing serious.
A deep gash in the fleshy parts.
Blade claves deep. Surface organs annihilated.
Cleaves through the pelvis and reaches the abdomen. Blood pours nonstop. Death is mercifully immediate.
Nothing serious.
Some blood, but can still be considered lucky.
Surface organs are damaged, but remain attached.
Say goodby to reproduction. Lots of blood.
Weapon almost reaches the navel and is stuck. Death is imminent.
Surface graze.
Slash across the thigh. Not deep.
Cut penetrates muscle tissue, but doesn't reach bone.
Blade bites deep. Femur chipped.
Femur broken with lots of blood. Epic feat of surgery needed to save the leg.
Funny bone effect.
Blade hits the knee, delivering a shallow wound and compromising balance.
Deeper cut along the knee that draws blood and compromises balance.
Knee fractured and jacked up. Causes limp due chipped bone and torn tendons.
Limb torn off at knee. Lots of blood.
Huts, but no blood.
Shallow wound across the shin, but blow compromises balance.
Blade connects with impact, draws blood and compromises balance.
Bone fractured with blood.
Limb cut off with lots of blood.
Close one.
Minor cut, but balance is compromised.
Hits bone, but foot stays intact.
Some toes lost.
Foot destroyed.
